text: Young Mr. Lincoln is a 1939 American biographical drama movie directed by John Ford and starring Henry Fonda, Alice Brady, Marjorie Weaver, Arleen Whelan, Pauline Moore, Donald Meek. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1940. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1939 drama movies Category:1930s biographical movies Category:1930s historical movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by John Ford Category:Movies set in the 1830s Category:Movies set in Illinois
title: Young Mr. Lincoln
